japex-maven-plugin Maven Mojo
Last Published: 2011-02-14  | Version: 1.2-SNAPSHOT
Japex
Overview
  • Introduction
  • Goals
  • Usage
Examples
  • Basic Example

japex:japex

Full name:

com.sun.japex:japex-maven-plugin:1.2-SNAPSHOT:japex

Description:

Goal to run Japex micro-benchmarks.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: test.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
html boolean - Produce HTML report?
Default value is: true.
japexConfig PlexusConfiguration - The XML of the Japex config to run. This should contain a single testSuite element. (Multiple test suites is a potential future enhancement). If you specify the configuration here, don't use japexConfigFiles.
japexConfigFiles File[] - Pathnames of one or more japex configuration files. If you specify configuration files here, don't use japexConfig.
reportDirectory File - Location of the output reports.
Default value is: ${project.build.directory}/reports/japex.
silent boolean - Just about no output.
Default value is: false.
verbose boolean - More information?
Default value is: false.

Parameter Details

html:

Produce HTML report?
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • Default: true

japexConfig:

The XML of the Japex config to run. This should contain a single testSuite element. (Multiple test suites is a potential future enhancement). If you specify the configuration here, don't use japexConfigFiles.
  • Type: org.codehaus.plexus.configuration.PlexusConfiguration
  • Required: No

japexConfigFiles:

Pathnames of one or more japex configuration files. If you specify configuration files here, don't use japexConfig.
  • Type: java.io.File[]
  • Required: No

reportDirectory:

Location of the output reports.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: No
  • Default: ${project.build.directory}/reports/japex

silent:

Just about no output.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • Default: false

verbose:

More information?
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • Default: false
